extendedInfo.description: Block unwanted calls & SMS/MMS now and protect your privacy. With most advanced features, you will no longer need to worry about privacy leak. If unwanted, intruding & untimely calls & text messages are annoying you & filling your mobile inbox with junk, you need this ultimate app!. Call Blocker 2.0 is the most effective call blocking app for AndroidFeatures[â] 4 blocking mode at choice (blacklist, all except whitelist, all, and non)[â] Block unwanted calls (reject calls, send to voicemail, or turn on silent mode immediately, forward or reply with an auto-SMS)[â] Block spam SMS (accept phonebook only or simply block black list)[â] Auto-responder: response to blocked calls/text[â] Block spam MMS (this is the first app on Google Play supports this feature)[â] Schedule to switch between blocking mode.[â] Easy to switch between blocking modeand moreâ 2 blocking technology can cover all phone. If the default one does not work, please try the "Use alternative block method"â Toggle notification settings if it annoys youâ Toggle logging settings if you need to completely block spammer in silentâ This is the first call filter apps that supports all models Android 2.0/2.1 (Eclair), Android 2.2 (Froyo), Android 2.3+ (Ginger Bread), Android 3.0 (Honeycomb) and ICS (4.0)---READ FIRST---* LG and Huawei phone users, please email dev if there is a problem with the call blocker not blocking anything or blocking every call.* Please note that installing the following apps such as: Mr.Number, Easy Filer Call Blocker & SMS, Call Filter, Call Control and Blacklist on your phone with Call Blocker 2.0 together may make your phone unstable or cause potential conflict.

reviews.title: Purdy darn gud
reviews.comment: I like it (really) i do, does just what instructions claims. U never kno wen anyone\'s blocked if u don\'t have the indicatior on. U can truly control who & what comes threw the ph. So ur privacy is priority. All stars 2 developer. Yayyyyyy!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems to work like a charm.
reviews.comment: Only had it installed for a day now and didn\'t have a chance to see  how well it works on messages but it\'s blocked a few calls so far. Other apps I\'ve tried only mute, this app actually sends them to voicemail And if you want picks up and hangs up. Easy on battery and uses very little memory.  Running on MotoDefy CM7mod, version 2.3.7. Now running JellyBean 4.1.1 and the screen wakes up now. :(
reviews.author: A Google User
